nodes.explanation: information or documents that have been obtained or acquired through various means
documents or information obtained through various means like FOIA requests or legal channels
references to information that has been obtained or acquired by a specific entity
text related to the origination or source of information/document, especially information being obtained or acquired
words related to acquiring or obtaining information or documents through some means
documents or information that have been obtained by someone
documents and information related to whistleblowers, government leaks, and secret files
